description:
The Agency:

Green House is an integrated creative engagement agency that cultivates and grows quantifiable, results-driven creativity. Unified by purpose, values, and our proprietary Cultivate process, we grow it forward! We believe that brands are built through applying art and science, our creative ‘green,’ and our strategic ‘house.’ A carefully constructed blend of individual creative thinking and strategic, commercially based rigor. Found in every Cultivator at Green House is this duality of both art and science. We know that bringing the right measure of both to our work is the key to a thriving culture and, ultimately, powerful creative brand engagements.

Job Summary:

The Regional Marketing Manager (RMM) provides direction and leadership to a team of Team Leads (TL) within the target market. Regional Managers are tasked with developing and implement marketing programs and initiatives to achieve brand and department goals. A top priority for this position is to support our regional sales teams and connecting local marketing activity to Integrated Marketing Experiences (IMX) that drive brand awareness and support volume and velocity.

RMMs develop and implement region-specific consumer-focused partnerships and marketing initiatives to achieve brand growth goals. RMMs leverage expert knowledge of regional consumers and local partners to build a brand culture and amplify Integrated Marketing objectives. A top priority for this position is to manage our Regional Field Marketing and Sales team, connecting regional activity to Integrated Marketing Experiences (IMX). The RMM provides direction and leadership to a regional team of internal and agency resources to:
• Enable Taste & Purchase
• Inspire New Champions
• Create Authentic & Unconventional Experiences

The RMM will also manage multiple program budgets, strategic goals, and KPI objectives while providing regular updates to benchmark success.

Primary Responsibilities/Activities:

Regional Brand Partnership & Programming: 60%
• Amplify local activation to the national stage
• Develop a market activation strategy
• Lead brand communication in the region
• Implement strategy and create local market tactics
• Source new partnerships - create and collaborate on brand activations
• Build and maintain current relationships - enable brand presence where culture is being created

Human Capital: 20%
• Manage a regional team of Team Leads
• Facilitate objective setting

Budget Management/Admin: 10%
• Budget and goals management and oversight
• Negotiating Terms
• ROI Evaluations

Leverage Field Sales & Bottlers: 10%
• Regional Bottler engagement
• Oversee and facilitate the collaboration of Regional Field Sales and Field Marketing programs

Minimum Requirements:
• Must live in and have a solid geographic knowledge of the market
• Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, Communications, Health & Wellness, or a related major
• 3+ years of Field Marketing of Brand Marketing experience, beverage or CPG preferred
• Budget management and accountability
• Project management and/or event planning experience
• Prior sales experience a plus
• Prior experience training and managing a team
• Must be willing to work flexible hours, including some early mornings, nights, and weekends with the ability to travel
• Valid driver’s license with a clean driving record
• Adept at Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Microsoft Suites
• In-depth knowledge of various social media platforms, best practices, and research
• Strong ability to multitask and prioritize responsibilities in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment
• Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively in a cross-functional, fast-paced team environment
• Highly organized with experience in professional relationship management

Financials:
• Base Salary: $110,000 - $120,000
• Bonus potential: 10%
• Transportation: 500/month
• Communication: 150/month
• Wellness: 50 / month
• Medical/Vision/Dental available
